reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 412/99: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - SUDBURY EAST PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY — SUDBURY EAST PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 412/99: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - SUDBURY EAST PLANNING BOARD
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consent under section 53 of the Act with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the Sudbury East Planning Board. O. Reg. 412/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The Minister’s authority to give consent under section 53 of the Act with respect to applications whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule is delegated to the Sudbury East Planning Board. O. Reg. 412/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 412/99, s. 2. SCHEDULE 52C-980010 52C-990002 O. Reg. 412/99, Sched.
